name: RyanQuest
description:
RyanQuest is an action third person game made with Unity Engine. You play as Ryan, an amateur GameDev trapped in his own unfinished and glitchy VR game. Using telekinetic habilities he must beat his own creation full of generic creatures and crappy lighting in order to escape from it. 

Credits:

Mairena Balaszczuk - Art
Federico Moroz - Prog, Game Design

12/03/2022: First alpha version uploaded.

Note: Yes, the jump sfx is from Dragon Ball.
